article_title: Survivors Recall Carnage and Terror in China Rampage
article_text:
KUNMING, China—As Shi Chenglin crouched in the crowded bus with a stab wound under his left shoulder blade, he could tell that the man lying at his feet was dying.

"He looked like he was in his 30s," the 18-year-old high-school student said. "His eyes were glassy, and his breathing was fast and shallow. There was blood everywhere on the floor."

Mr. Shi and others on the bus were fleeing what authorities...

twitter.description: Victims of a mass knife attack in southwest China recount a panicked stampede, hiding in darkness and the singular wail of hundreds of people screaming at once.
twitter.creator: @YapCW

image.alt: Survivors recall carnage and terror in China rampage.

twitter.title: Survivors Recount Horrors of China Attack

article_summary:
KUNMING, China—As Shi Chenglin crouched in the crowded bus with a stab wound under his left shoulder blade, he could tell that the man lying at his feet was dying.
Mr. Shi and others on the bus were fleeing what authorities...
"He looked like he was in his 30s," the 18-year-old high-school student said.
"His eyes were glassy, and his breathing was fast and shallow.
There was blood everywhere on the floor."
